title: Ring Pop Individually Wrapped Bulk 20 Count Lollipop Variety Christmas Holiday Party Pack ‚Äî Lollipop Suckers w/ Assorted Flavors - Fun Candy for Holiday Parties and Stocking Stuffers
description: Ring Pop is the ultimate iconic wearable lollipop hard candy to hand out this holiday season, with an enormous eye-catching candy gem that's so deliciously playful, the fun never ends! Deliciously festive, this hard candy is adored by kids and adults alike, making it ideal for sharing with family and friends during the holidays! These shelf-stable treats can also add a fun twist to holiday celebrations! Vibrantly colorful and unique, Ring Pops add an extra level of fun to holiday parties and are the perfect lollipop snack to stuff Christmas stockings with. These shelf-stable candies are great for any kid's holiday candy bags! Ring Pop bulk variety packs are the ultimate candy for holiday parties, with a wide assortment of fruity flavors loved by adults and kids alike! They also make deliciously fun individually wrapped fillers for a holiday party favor candy bag, and make great holiday decorations! Celebrate Christmas, Hanukkah, Kwanza, or New Year's with Ring Pop, because these lollipop assortments are great for any kid's holiday candy bags and make great stocking stuffers or candy gifts. So, what are you waiting for? Brighten up your next big holiday party with this iconic holiday sucker. Each lollipop variety bag includes 20 individually-wrapped Ring Pop gem candy lollipops in a selection of 5 assorted flavors, with everyone's classic mouthwatering favorites - Strawberry, Blue Raspberry, Cherry, Watermelon, and Twisted Berry Blast. Unwrap the fun at your next Christmas party, and share in the jolly fun with your favorite flavor from this 20-count variety pack! Ring Pop candy lollipops make an excellent gift candy, ideal for sharing with friends and other Christmas party-goers! Keep them in your pantry for a tasty snack, or a delicious holiday candy treat. Bring a bag to your Christmas party or gathering! Our holiday candy mix is shelf-stable and long-lasting. Disclaimer: Not for children 3 and under.

title: Ring Pop Hard Candy Pops, Variety Pack, 44 Count
description: With over 40 years of history, Ring Pops remain a pop culture icon that every generation loves. These tangy, sweet gemstones atop a plastic, expandable ring fit nearly any finger, with a handy disc to keep dribbles away from your fingers. This item remains a top-ranked candy offering and has a proven track record as a top seller. It's ideal for all occasions including convenience stores, concessions, vending machines, offices, parties and pantries. Features 44 individually wrapped Ring Pops in each jar, including new Ring Pop Sours.

description: Ring Pop Colorfest Blue Raspberry is the ultimate iconic wearable lollipop hard candy with an eye-catching blue candy gem that is deliciously playful. This hard blue raspberry candy gem and matching blue ring are adored by kids and adults which makes it perfect for sharing with family and friends at holiday parties, blue-themed parties, holiday gatherings, kids‚Äô birthday parties, bachelorette parties, weddings, and almost any special occasion. Add these blue lollipops as stocking stuffers for sweet Christmas fun! Vibrantly colorful and unique, Ring Pop Colorfest Blue Raspberry candy adds a level of fun to any hangout, no matter where it may be. Each blue raspberry lollipop variety bag includes 30 individually-wrapped blue Ring Pop gem candy lollipops in a classic mouthwatering raspberry flavor that kids [and adults] love! So, what are you waiting for? Unwrap the fun, create a blue holiday-themed candy bar, and enjoy the delicious blue raspberry candy gem lollipops at your next holiday gathering. The perfect Holiday treats to hand out to friends and family at your next holiday gathering because hangouts are way more fun with the Ring Pop Colorfest Blue Raspberry party pack. There are enough festive blue lollipop rings to go around and share the fun together! Ring Pop Colorfest festive blue candy lollipops are great treats for parents to share from the variety of blue flashy gems as blue party favors, candy gifts, holiday candy bags, prizes, or snacks for everyone to enjoy--they‚Äôre ideal for sharing! Brighten up your next holiday hangout and bring a bag of these delicious blue raspberry candy treats to share with friends and family. Ring Pop is great holiday candy, adds some pizzazz to your Ugly Christmas Sweater outfit, and is perfect to use as stocking stuffers. Our blue raspberry candy mix is shelf-stable, long-lasting, and great for kids. Disclaimer: Not for children 3 and under.

Had about 15 leftover I put in a separate candy bowl for Halloween trick-or-treaters and the small kids who got them were SO excited they shouted out to other kids on the street ‚ÄúThey have ring pops!‚Äù And then we got mobbed by the mostly preschool crowd. I will buy more for next Halloween again to keep in a separate bowl from our regular candy and the other bowl of non-edible treats (little party favor toys I get on Amazon or at the party store‚Äîthose are great too because they don‚Äôt go bad, so I pack up the leftovers in a big ziploc and have them ready for next Halloween).

title: Ryse Core Series Loaded Pre | Pump, Energy, Strength | L-Citrulline, Beta Alanine, L-Theanine, Caffeine, Thinkamine | 30 Servings (Cherry Ring Pop¬Æ)

reviews.name: Jay B
reviews.reviewTitle: Works great for the gym but gross taste.
reviews.review: I‚Äôve used different types of pre-workouts, and I gotta say‚Ä¶ this one is pretty good. I workout a lot and I need myself a good pre-workout to get me pumped up and gets me moving when lifting. I definitely would recommend this product of you workout a lot, and have a good tolerance to caffeine. Only reason why I gave it four stars was because the flavor isn‚Äôt the best. It has a nasty sour taste at the end, but overall, good product. (Edit: I forgot to mentioned the flavor which is Tropical Punch.)

reviews.name: Nromano
reviews.review: I have been using Ryse for awhile now and needed a re-up on my pre workout quickly, therefore I ordered it from . Was a little skeptical but this product delivered. Great flavor, but a little on the "coconutty" side. Still great in my opinion however. The ingredients are pretty well balanced when compared to other pre workouts out there. I am a big fan of the "pump" and I can say that this product gives me some of the best pumps I have gotten. Great price in comparison to Ryse's actual website. 10/10 will be purchasing again.

reviews.name: Melanie
reviews.review: like this product, could maybe give u more for your dollar overall strong flavor , strong boost in energy and pump.

reviews.name: marina dem
reviews.reviewTitle: ITS ALL ABOUT BALANCE BUT I AM CONFLICTED.
reviews.review:
PROS: If you like swallowing (read my cons)
Its almost a halfway crack.
Focused vision.
More energy.
Pumps.

CONS: YOU CAN'T DRY SCOOP IT. I had the smartiest candy flavor and it forms multiple bubbles in my mouth which I had to try to keep swallowing and swallowing and swallowing then I was able to rinse it down with water.

Is it worth it? You get increased focus in the gym but you risk spitting the preworkout if you can't handle a dry scoop? If you say you mix the preworkout with water then and don't dry scoop it. SHUT THE HELL UP (sarcastically because I know u snowflakes can get butthurt). REAL MEN AND WOMEN DRY SCOOP IT.

OVERALL IT GETS A NICE BALANCE :) I think..

reviews.name: Kakes Cruz
reviews.review: Tastes great!!! Arrived early, highly recommend.

reviews.name: LA Saraz
reviews.review: One of my PWOs in rotation now. Good amount of beta alanine tingle, not too much but just enough to know its working

reviews.name: Kindle Customer
reviews.review: Item as it appeared

reviews.name: meghan jones
reviews.reviewTitle: Tastes like candy and electricity, and feels that way
reviews.review: I went easy on the first dose since this has a much higher caffeine content than my last pre-work out. I went in with a half scoop. It taste likes candy and electricity..not great, but I knocked it back. 10 minutes into my CrossFit class, my hands, feet, ears and face were all itchy and tingly and I was LIT through the whole class. Definitely got a serious boost from the stuff. Definitely not an every day preworkout for me, but definitely a good option for low energy days for a high intensity workout.

The ring holder would circle the plat when totally flipped, keep steady when put it on table.
Unique 4-layer coating finished, great protection for the phone ring holder stand and keep the color forever!
Keep steady when place the phone on table, the camera lens in parallel with the table surface, stay away from scratches.

How To Use:
Ensure the phone or phone case is free of dust and dry it.
Remove the protective film and do not touch the adhesive surface.
Sticking phone ring from one side to the other slowly and pull out in time while air bubbles appear.
If cell phone ring holder still appear air bubbles, please push out the outward direction.

reviews.name: Fantasy Lover

reviews.review: The adhesive was great! Looks great! Well worth its price. The ring got loose and wouldn't hold my phone up after a month, but I rarely used the ring for that anyway so it didn't bother me.

reviews.name: Peanut butter box is here...
reviews.review: Adhesion doesn't work on my silicone cover (as it shouldn't) I used some crazy glue and it's working great! Some say theirs broke eventually but come on, for the price and the fact you get 4, I'm not worried because the expensive one's eventually break too

reviews.name: Bowslayer
reviews.review: Work as intended

reviews.name: nadimel
reviews.review: While these are super cute and add to the appearance of the phone, the only negative aspect about them is that the finger holder is not durable after a bit of use. If you're like me and move the ring holder around depending on how you use your phone, eventually it will become loose and either break off completely or keep popping out and you'll have to keep popping it back in place which gets annoying after a while. Perhaps that's why they sell them in a pack

reviews.name: Jerry Anderson
reviews.reviewTitle: Super cute and not too big
reviews.review: I got these as a gift and they are super cute and have good colors

reviews.name: Erin S.
reviews.review:
It fits alright on most phone cases. However, on some, you have to force it on there and hold it in place for a while.

I've used two of these on 2 different phone cases.

The ring part on the phone is stiff and nice for a good week or two, but after that it becomes loose and it just hangs down whenever you're typing. After it gets loose, don't expect to be able to prop your phone up to watch videos or to game.

The actual grip is like any other ring holder. It's nice until you hold it for a long time and then you just get uncomfortable.

reviews.name: Karsandra
reviews.review: It really works and the colors are pretty, I was pleased.

reviews.name: Kevin R. Hunt
reviews.review: Stuck this on one of those credit card/money holders you put on the back of your phone. The one on my phone is a vinyl material and has an alligator design, so it's raised in parts. This ring adhered to it without a problem, and has held up to daily use since April. If the ring is tight, that's because the adhesive they use for the back goes over the ring part, so the ring gets stuck to the glue and makes it hard to turn. But I found 2 things work to fix that: First, when you adhere the ring, don't push the center where the ring is, just push all around it. This way the ring part itself doesn't get adhered by the glue. 2nd, if you do push it where the ring is, just keep turning the ring to try to break the seal of the glue. Just keep doing that a number of times until it loosens up enough for you. I would think if you do it too much it will get too loose, don't know, never got that far. But I've used both methods on these type of ring holders and both work, I've just never turned the ring until it was too loose. I'd recommend these.

title: Bazooka Candy Brands Holiday Candy Box - 18 Count Lollipops W/ Assorted Flavors From Ring Pop, Push Pop, Baby Bottle Pop & Juicy Drop - Candy Gift Box For The Holidays - 12.4 Ounce (Pack Of 1)
description: Bazooka Candy Brands‚Äô lollipop candy mix is the ultimate bulk variety of hard candy this holiday season! Perfect for festive Christmas parties and winter celebrations, this candy box comes with an assortment of the iconic Ring Pop, Push Pop, Baby Bottle Pop, and Juicy Drop lollipop suckers in several mouth-watering flavors. These shelf-stable treats are the perfect individually wrapped lollipops to share with friends who love candy or to take with you to a Christmas or holiday party this year! These hard candies are adored by kids and adults alike, which makes them ideal for sharing with family and friends. Bazooka Candy Brands' variety box is the gift that keeps on giving! Deliciously simple, this bulk candy box contains a fantastic assortment of lollipops to share. This variety of lollipops has endless possibilities -- so make sure to bring them to a winter holiday party, birthday party, you can take them to an Ugly Sweater party, hand them out as party favors at your holiday party, or enjoy some with your kids at home. So, what are you waiting for? Take a box of these mouth-watering individually wrapped candy treats to your friends and family this holiday so they too can enjoy the delicious fun! Each 18-count variety candy box contains 6 Ring Pop lollipops, 4 Push Pop lollipops, 4 Baby Bottle Pop lollipops, and 4 Juicy Drop lollipops in an assortment of fruity flavors: Strawberry (all), Blue Raspberry (all), Cosmic Strawberry Lemonade (BBP),Cherry Watermelon (PP). Unwrap the fun at your upcoming holiday party because the variety pack means there are different tasty flavors for each to enjoy, but enough to go around and share the fun together! Bazooka Candy Brands' variety mix of hard candy lollipops is ideal for sharing! Keep them on hand as a pantry staple candy box for snacks or a delicious candy treat. Our holiday lollipop assortment is shelf-stable and long-lasting. Disclaimer: Not for children 3 and under.

title: Magnetic Phone Grip, Allengel Magnetic Phone Ring Holder Stand, Adjustable Kickstand for iPhone 14 Pro, 14 Pro Max, 14 Plus, 14, 13 and 12 Series (Rose Gold and White Ceramic)

reviews.name: RP
reviews.reviewTitle: Broke after less than a month
reviews.review: Loved it until today, less than 30 days later, it broke. Very disappointed.

reviews.name: NR
reviews.review: This was bigger than it imagined. It adheres to the phone well. It is uncomfortable to me and my thin fingers, it doesn't rest in a comfortable spot for me. If the inner/holding loop was smaller it would be perfect. It is heavy duty, not thin of flimsy and not bulky.

reviews.name: BTW
reviews.review:
This Allengel Magnetic Phone Grip Ring Holder adds a bit of bling to my iPhone 14.

The strong magnet of the aqua green enameled ring over rose gold attaches and holds directly to my phone (right through the leather case). It works without having to use any of the included stickers, rings and cleaning pads that are included for using with other phones or iPads, Kindles, etc.

The ring gives me a good grip on my iPhone and allows me to hold on more securely and with less fatigue. I'll be less likely to drop the phone while using this ring grip.

The ring is easy to remove when not in use, or for when the phone needs to be charged. The small ring on the back is on a swivel, so it can be turned when you want to use the grip as a stand, which is very sturdy.

The ring is embellished with 5 inset faux diamonds and is highly polished like a piece of jewelry.

This Magnetic Phone Grip would make a great gift!

reviews.name: Nichole
reviews.review: I love the look of it, very sleek look. The rose gold is a perfect match with the black, I get tons of compliments. It is sturdy in a weird way I feel comfortable holding it by the ring but if I‚Äôm sitting and it drops even on a soft surface it pops off. Swinging it while I‚Äôm walking it seems fine and I haven‚Äôt had any accidents yet. It‚Äôs very pretty and worth it.

reviews.name: Testingtesting123
reviews.reviewTitle: Nice ring holder. More versatile than I thought and pretty.
reviews.review:
This magnetic phone ring holder/stand is really pretty. The pearly looking green color is beautiful and the rose gold with little "diamond" gems looks fancy, much better than some pop socket or strictly utilitarian ring holder. I'm using it on an S22+. I did not use their included circular rings to adhere it. I've found in the past that similar rings didn't typically stick well though again I did not test these as I use my own magnet on my case.

I didn't realize when I ordered this that besides the ring flipping up and down 180¬∞ it can also spin since that little rose gold ball rotates 360¬∞. With some ring holders you have to actually spin the entire magnetic piece to get a different orientation of the ring so I really liked that. The magnet on the ring holder itself is very strong. I have no feeling that it would accidentally come unattached, it's really on there. It works pretty well as a stand (with the phone horizontally). Time will tell if it gets loose/floppy with a lot of use.

Overall it's super pretty and so far I'm really happy with it. It's better than I thought it would be. Would recommend.

reviews.name: Mo
reviews.reviewTitle: Strong magnetic hold and very beautiful
reviews.review: I've tried a handful of magsafe rings lately and this is one of my favorites. It holds strong and the blinged out ring is very pretty.

reviews.name: me
reviews.review: I love the look of this phone grip. It replaced my pop socket and I like it a lot.

reviews.name: Nick
reviews.review:
This is a very nice phone holder. It's very sturdy, easy to use and is fully compatible with Magsafe but it also comes with separate sticking metal rings in case you want to use it on a case that does not have Magsafe.
The finish is very nice and the ceramic ring is beautiful!
Overall this is a very versatile and beautifully made holder that can be use with or without Magsafe .. Love it!

title: lenoup Glitter Bling Bling Phone Ring Holder,Sparkle Phone Ring Grip Artificial Diamond Stand,Rhinestone Cell Finger Ring for Phones,Pad(Silver)
description:
Usage Method:
1. Wipe away dirt dust on the back of your phones or tablets and dry it completely.
2. Peel off the back of paper.Don't touch the adhesive surface by your hands.
3. Please confirm the perfect place to stick the phone ring as the adhesive is not reusable.
4. Press the pad hard against your phone or tablet for 30 seconds.
5. Apply it on flat surface. The adhesive is not suitable for textured /leather/silicon phone case.
6. Apply it on small size tablet, it might be not strong enough for extra large tablet.


How to Remove?
Use a hard card and insert it into the seam of the case and move it gently.

Package included:
1*silver bling phone ring holder
